name: Sonakshi Creations
overview:
Sonakshi Creations was established in the year 2006 as a sole proprietorship firm. The company started its operations as a manufacturer, exporter and supplier of a comprehensive range of Wooden Handicraft, Marble Handicraft, Sandalwood Handicraft, Brass Handicraft, Metal Handicraft, Wood Craft and Wooden Sculpture. Attributing to high quality standards, our products have received huge appreciation in this challenging industry. We bring forth range, which has fine finish and is completely flawless.

Our Products: Marble Handicraft Sandalwood Handicraft Brass Handicraft Metal Handicraft Wood Craft

Our Infrastructure: Our company has established sound infrastructural set-up, where we ably perform our business operations and meet bulk as well as specified orders of clients successfully. It comprises various departments such as production, quality control, administrative and many others.

Client Satisfaction: We consider clients as the biggest asset of our company and we have focused our efforts towards satisfying them immensely. For this, we provide custom made solutions, in which products are developed as per the specific demands of clients.

Our Quality: We have set-up benchmarks in the industry, by endlessly offering better quality products to clients at industrial leading prices. Since establishment, we have maintained high quality standards in all our business activities as well as products we supply. Various quality control measures are also adopted to ensure that the supplied range is in compliance to prescribed industrial guiding principles.
